item.title: Broadview Networks OfficeSuite Brings The Cloud To SMB
item.description: Smaller companies often want to adopt money-saving technologies like VoIP, private networks, and cloud services, but the initial investment can be daunting. While internet-based options seem appealing, their quality and reliability are often a concern. Fortunately, there’s a solution for businesses of all sizes to access these advanced tools without breaking the bank. Broadview Networks’ OfficeSuite offers a comprehensive solution, effectively serving as a company’s central office across multiple locations. This enterprise-grade PBX system provides the functionality of a traditional system with the convenience of easy administration through a web browser.
